title: Bobby Gets Measured To Prove Internet Wrong + Lauren Alaina On What She’ll Do If She Messes Up Tonight + Bobby’s Mailbag: Advice On Boyfriend Who Is Always Late
itunes:title: Bobby Gets Measured To Prove Internet Wrong + Lauren Alaina On What She’ll Do If She Messes Up Tonight + Bobby’s Mailbag: Advice On Boyfriend Who Is Always Late
description:
A listener called about Bobby’s height being listed wrong on the internet...so we busted out a tape measure to get his official height. We check in with Lauren Alaina as she goes into Disney night on Dancing With The Stars. We open up the mailbag with an email from a listener whose boyfriend of 3 years is always late.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
